metadata.title: CVE-2018-19839 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In LibSass prior to 3.5.5, the function handle_error in sass_context.cppallows attackers to cause a denial-of-service resulting from a heap-basedbuffer over-read via a crafted sass file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19839` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsass0 - 3.4.8-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libsass package in esm-apps/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.4.8-1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
